Articles.Content:
This is my first post in the forum, sorry for bad speling, (I'm spanish)

I started playing this game 6 months ago. I beeing looking post in the forum for one month and this monday I bought the game, I was playing with the "demo". Sorry for not buying the game before but it's amazing and everybody should buy it. Also I didn't post anything in the forum because I felt bad doing that without the full game. So I will post later my first plane. I did it today for a competition of speed with one friend. His plane max. speed was 789 m/s mine 1465 m/s I don't know if that's high but I also do it manoeuvrable, not the best handling but decent. Thanks for reading and good luck Kerbonauts

Also, If you see any spelling mystake tell me I want to practice written english

Welcome to the forums!

Glad to hear that you've been enjoying the game so far. Feel free to share any of your other accomplishments as well, or to ask questions about anything you're still trying to figure out. I run a little list of tutorials called the Drawing Board, which is conveniently linked in my signature; you might find some of those useful if you ever get stuck.

Don't feel bad about your English, since it's certainly better than my Spanish On that note, we do also have a Spanish-language subforum as well, so if you ever have something you want to ask but can't quite figure out how to put it in English, feel free to ask it there.

Hope this helps!

Hello! Welcome aboard. :3

Also, your English isn't bad at all ^^
Hello I to had the demo forever before I got the real version. I was so happy when I finally got the full version. At any rate welcome to the forums!
